001
002package com.commercetools.http.javanet;
003
004import java.io.ByteArrayInputStream;
005import java.io.IOException;
006import java.io.InputStream;
007import java.net.http.HttpClient;
008import java.net.http.HttpRequest;
009import java.net.http.HttpResponse;
010import java.util.*;
011import java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture;
012import java.util.concurrent.ExecutorService;
013import java.util.function.Supplier;
014import java.util.stream.Collectors;
015import java.util.zip.GZIPInputStream;
016
017import io.vrap.rmf.base.client.*;
018
019import org.apache.commons.io.IOUtils;
020import org.apache.commons.io.input.AutoCloseInputStream;
021
022public class CtJavaNetHttpClient extends HttpClientBase {
023    private final HttpClient javaHttpClient;
024
025    private static final String APPLICATION_JSON = "application/json";
026    private final Supplier<HttpClient.Builder> clientBuilder = HttpClient::newBuilder;
027
028    public CtJavaNetHttpClient() {
029        super();
030        javaHttpClient = clientBuilder.get().build();
031    }
032
033    public CtJavaNetHttpClient(final BuilderOptions options) {
034        super();
035        javaHttpClient = options.plus(clientBuilder.get()).build();
036    }
037
038    public CtJavaNetHttpClient(final Supplier<HttpClient.Builder> builderSupplier) {
039        super();
040        javaHttpClient = builderSupplier.get().build();
041    }
042
043    public CtJavaNetHttpClient(final ExecutorService executor) {
044        super(executor);
045        javaHttpClient = clientBuilder.get().build();
046    }
047
048    public CtJavaNetHttpClient(final ExecutorService executor, final BuilderOptions options) {
049        super(executor);
050        javaHttpClient = options.plus(clientBuilder.get()).build();
051    }
052
053    public CtJavaNetHttpClient(final ExecutorService executor, final Supplier<HttpClient.Builder> builderSupplier) {
054        super(executor);
055        javaHttpClient = builderSupplier.get().build();
056    }
057
058    private HttpRequest toJavaNetRequest(final ApiHttpRequest httpRequest) {
059        final HttpRequest.Builder builder = HttpRequest.newBuilder();
060
061        final String method = httpRequest.getMethod().toString();
062        builder.uri(httpRequest.getUri());
063        httpRequest.getHeaders().getHeaders().forEach((entry) -> builder.header(entry.getKey(), entry.getValue()));
064
065        if (httpRequest.getBody() != null) {
066            String mediaType = APPLICATION_JSON;
067            if (httpRequest.getHeaders()
068                    .getHeaders()
069                    .stream()
070                    .anyMatch(s -> s.getKey().equalsIgnoreCase(ApiHttpHeaders.CONTENT_TYPE))) {
071                mediaType = httpRequest.getHeaders().getFirst(ApiHttpHeaders.CONTENT_TYPE);
072            }
073            builder.setHeader(ApiHttpHeaders.CONTENT_TYPE, mediaType);
074
075            builder.method(method, HttpRequest.BodyPublishers.ofByteArray(httpRequest.getBody()));
076        }
077        else {
078            builder.method(method, HttpRequest.BodyPublishers.noBody());
079        }
080        return builder.build();
081    }
082
083    @Override
084    public CompletableFuture<ApiHttpResponse<byte[]>> execute(ApiHttpRequest request) {
085        return javaHttpClient.sendAsync(toJavaNetRequest(request), HttpResponse.BodyHandlers.ofByteArray())
086                .thenApplyAsync(CtJavaNetHttpClient::toResponse, executor());
087    }
088
089    private static ApiHttpResponse<byte[]> toResponse(final HttpResponse<byte[]> response) {
090
091        final ApiHttpHeaders apiHttpHeaders = new ApiHttpHeaders(response.headers()
092                .map()
093                .entrySet()
094                .stream()
095                .flatMap(e -> e.getValue().stream().map(value -> ApiHttpHeaders.headerEntry(e.getKey(), value)))
096                .collect(Collectors.toList()));
097
098        final byte[] bodyNullable = Optional.ofNullable(response.body()).map((entity) -> {
099            try {
100                final boolean gzipEncoded = response.headers()
101                        .firstValue(ApiHttpHeaders.CONTENT_ENCODING)
102                        .map(v -> v.equalsIgnoreCase("gzip"))
103                        .orElse(false);
104                final InputStream body = new ByteArrayInputStream(entity);
105                final InputStream content = gzipEncoded ? new GZIPInputStream(body) : body;
106                final AutoCloseInputStream autoCloseInputStream = new AutoCloseInputStream(content);
107                return IOUtils.toByteArray(autoCloseInputStream);
108            }
109            catch (final IOException e) {
110                throw new HttpException(e);
111            }
112        }).orElse(null);
113
114        return new ApiHttpResponse<>(response.statusCode(), apiHttpHeaders, bodyNullable);
115    }
116
117    /**
118     * closes the underlying HTTP client
119     * @throws Exception in case of failure closing the client
120     */
121    @Override
122    public void closeDelegate() throws Exception {
123    }
124}
